title: Doctors warn of a stealth opioid 20x more potent than fentanyl
summary: Nitazenes, a powerful and largely hidden class of synthetic opioids, are quickly becoming a deadly factor in the overdose crisis.

title: Why so many young kids with ADHD are getting the wrong treatment
summary: Preschoolers with ADHD are often given medication right after diagnosis, against medical guidelines that recommend starting with behavioral therapy.

title: New drug could be first to stop deadly fatty liver disease
summary: Scientists at UC San Diego have identified a new drug, ION224, that could transform the treatment of MASH, a dangerous form of fatty liver disease tied to obesity and diabetes.

title: Daily eye drops could make reading glasses obsolete
summary: Eye drops combining pilocarpine and diclofenac helped patients read extra lines on vision charts, with effects lasting up to two years.

title: Most quit breakthrough weight-loss drug within a year
summary: A massive Danish study reveals that despite the remarkable weight-loss benefits of semaglutide, more than half of adults without diabetes stop using it within a year.

title: Novel Antibody Neutralizes a Wide Range of HIV Variants
